kinnara wiwaha mangalyaya kisidu ussawashriyak nogani.diyaniyaka wadiwiyata pathwu pasu age awassa massina wisin kumana ho awasthawaka aya kadawagena yayi.mehidi kisidu charithra warathrayak anugamanaya nokarayi.awassa nana massina wiwahaya owun athara pradhanama wiwaha kramaya wana athara diga ha binna kramayata enam manaliya manalayage niwasata yama ha manalaya manaliyage niwasata yama siduwiya.mowunage wisheshathwaya nam ekageyikama wani wiwahakrama owun athara nopawathimayi.esema wiwahaya thula charithra warithra ho kisidu ussawashriyak nogathha.ese mahasamajaye sammatha charithra warithra owunata thahanchiya.

ekspras parl nauka anathure balapama hethuwen dhiwara katayuthu adala wu migamuwa kalapuwe dhiwara katayuthu sandaha ada (12) sita awasara labadena bawa dhiwara rajya amathya kanchana wijesekara prakasha kala.ohu me bawa sandahan kale ekspras parl nawa gini ganimath samanga migamuwa dhiwarayin muhuna di athi gatalu pilibanda sakachcha kirimata ada migamuwa nagara shalawe pawathi sakachchawata ekwemin.me athara naukawe balapama hethuwen dhiwara katayuthuwala yedimata nohaki wu migamuwa sita panadura dakwa muhudu thiraya nisi adhyayanayakin anathuruwa dhiwara katayuthu sandaha wiwrutha karana lesa agramathya mahinda rajapaksha wisin upades laba dunna.
